gst.ui

Class SignalPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • gst.ui.SignalPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SignalPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The panel containing all signalgraphs and the controls to resize them. Implemented as Singleton. Supports ActionListener.
    Version:
    0.2.5.1 (15.10.2012)
    Author:
    Enrico Grunitz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  SignalPanel.ScrollLockManager
      ActionListener that reacts on ScrollActionEvents and updates all SignalViews that are scroll locked.
      static class  SignalPanel.ScrollToActionEvent
      An ActionEvent that occurs when a SignalView should scroll to a specific point in time (domain axis wise).
      private class  SignalPanel.SignalPanelComponentAdapter
      ComponentAdapter to save new size of panel after resizing.
      static class  SignalPanel.ZoomActionEvent
      An ActionEvent that occurs when a SignalView should zoom to a specific time range.
      private class  SignalPanel.ZoomLockManager
      ActionListener that reacts on ZoomActionEvents and updates all SignalViews that are zoom locked.

             boolean visible)
        Adds the given ChartPanel to the display.
        Parameters:
        element - the ChartPanel to be added
        visible - flag if the SignalView should be displayed

      • removeSignal

        public boolean removeSignal(SignalView element)
        Removes the given ChartPanel from the display.
        Parameters:
        element - ChartPanel to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if element was removed, false if the given element was not displayed (and so cannot be removed)
